description:
The Shifter Long Sleeve Sweatshirt is a sleek and stylish pullover ideal for versatile, everyday layering performance. Made with a super-soft 100% merino wool terry fabric, the Shifter is naturally breathable, odor-resistant and incredibly comfortable. The ribbed neckline, cuffs and hem provide a clean, classic finish. 

Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics. Merino is an annually renewable fiber that naturally resists odors, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Icebreaker Shifter LS Sweatshirt - Mens
